value.title: AI needs an open labeling platform
value.excerpt: Training data platforms are emerging as the best way to handle the collection, labeling, and feeding of data into supervised learning models.

value.title: Op-ed: Gamestop's costly financial lesson for retail investors
value.excerpt: Retail investors buying frenzy for Gamestop shares resulted in $10 billion in losses when Robinhood halted trading in the stock. It was a costly lesson.

value.title: Minneapolis-St. Paul Airport Gets Facial Recognition Tech
value.excerpt: St. Paul International Airport is gaining new facial recognition technology called Simplified Arrival to speed up the process for international travelers passing through customs.

value.title: Patrick J. McGovern Foundation invests in AI for public good

value.title: The youngest AI programmer in the world is a 7-year-old Guinness record holder
value.excerpt: Kautilya Katariya, a computer whiz from the UK, became the youngest qualified computer programmer in the world last year at just six-years-old after taking a series of computer lessons including AI courses from IBM.

value.title: Porsche Venture Arm Backs Cresta, AI Startup With A-List Co-Founder

value.title: Google CEO slammed by AI ethics researcher for blaming public feud on transparency
value.excerpt: Google CEO Sundar Pichai credited the company's transparency for the backlash over Timnit Gebru's firing, earning a withering rebuke from the AI ethicist.

value.title: Confluent strengthens strategic alliance with Microsoft

value.title: Physna raises $20 million for AI that analyzes and digitizes 3D objects
value.excerpt: Physna, a startup developing software that analyzes and digitizes 3D models, has raised $20 million in venture capital.

value.title: Huami to launch third-generation self-developed wearable chip soon
value.excerpt: Huami Technology is a company that excels in smart wearable technology. Headquartered in Hefei, China, the company also makes its own AI-powered wearable chips. Today, the company’s founder has announced that the third-generation wearable chip is coming soon.

value.title: South Korean AI technology brings back folk singer's voice
value.excerpt: Even though South Korean folk rock singer Kim Kwang-seok has been dead for nearly 25 years, his fans will be able to hear him perform a new song cover on Friday thanks to artificial intelligence (AI) technology used to recreate his voice.

value.title: Robot empowerment - a viable alternative to Asimov's three laws of robotics?
value.excerpt: Human-robot interaction is upon us - we're in dire need of a framework that makes sense. Asimov's three laws of robotics are one model, but is it applicable to today's robots? An alternative based on robot "empowerment" is worth a close look.

value.title: Machine Learning Tool May Streamline OR Scheduling
